803450.name: Earthworms - Soundtrack
803450.description:
Earthworms wonderful game music was sculpted from darkness and silence by Piotr Surmacz. And what a fine sculptor he is! If you like mysterious game tunes as much as we do, please support Piotr and buy the soundtrack! :)

The soundtrack consists of 15 tracks in MP3 format:

1. Intro (1:36)
2. The Riddle (3:09)
3. Village (4:08)
4. Forest (4:11)
5. Basement (3:02)
6. Canyon (3:31)
7. Spiritual Desert (3:58)
8. Portal (3:36)
9. Time Drops (3:27)
10. Generator (3:18)
11. Alien Lullaby (4:52)
12. Trance (2:17)
13. Dreams (4:21)
14. Ending (1:39)
15. Bonus - Early music concept (3:07)
